. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
name: Bright Studio/Loft in Restored Factory Building.
review: Great apartment in a great location in Williamsburg. Lovely restaurants and great coffee place nearby. Close to the Williamsburg bridge so can walk into Manhattan but also close to subway stations. Krystof was a good host, communication was easy and he was helpful with questions we had.
